character.statement: I can't even afford feed for my chickens anymore! How can we survive?

exchange.question: What's going on here?
exchange.answer: This used to be a proud place, but it was sacked by Captain Crawfish!

exchange.question: Who is Captain Crawfish?
exchange.answer: Why, the most vile pirate who ever roamed the seas!

exchange.question: Do you think Captain Crawfish will come back?
exchange.answer: If we ever get anything he wants to steal, he will!

character.statement: If only we still had our treasure map... then we'd have hope!
If only someone could rid our waters of Captain Crawfish!
When I grow up, I'm going to take to the high seas and sink Captain Crawfish!
If only we had a way to signal the other ships! How I long to take to the seas!
